meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a single string attached to a bow-shaped wooden resonator.
meanings.sent1: The berimbau made a beautiful sound when struck gently.
meanings.sent2: During the performance, the musician played the berimbau with skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: The berimbau and the drum had a friendly competition to see who could make the loudest noise.
meanings.sent4: The berimbau's melody danced through the air, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of the berimbau made it stand out among the other instruments.

meanings.definition: The act of playing the berimbau.
meanings.sent1: His berimbau playing was rhythmic and captivating.
meanings.sent2: The berimbau's sound filled the room as he performed with skill.
meanings.sent3: She tried to imitate the berimbau playing but ended up making everyone laugh instead.
meanings.sent4: The berimbau's music echoed in his mind long after he had stopped playing.
meanings.sent5: The berimbau player's passion was evident in every note he played.
